macro_kKJzVrrx.name: add_audit_cols
macro_kKJzVrrx.definition:
SELECT 
  *,
  current_timestamp() AS modified_on,
  '{{ modified_by }}' AS modified_by
FROM {{ table_name }}

propertiesFile.name: macros_001
propertiesFile.content:
---
version: 2
macros:
- name: "add_audit_cols"
  arguments:
  - name: "table_name"
    type: "unknown"
  - name: "modified_by"
    type: "unknown"
  macroType: "query"
